summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) Person Lookout Query hit notification email chain, showing that a query was run on Jeffrey Epstein's record (P3N06596100A01) on February 25, 2021. The notification was forwarded within the FBI's New York Field Office and Eurasian Organized Crime Task Force.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The query record is for Jeffrey Epstein, identified by his TECSID P3N06596100A01, showing his record was accessed in a Person Lookout Query system.

persons.name: BHayes
persons.context: Appears as the sender (BHayes@fbi.gov) forwarding the CBP query hit notification within the FBI.

events.title: CBP Person Lookout Query on Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A Person Lookout Query was executed in the TECS system for Jeffrey Epstein (TECSID: P3N06596100A01) by a user at CBP Headquarters, OFO National Targeting Center.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's law enforcement record (TECSID: P3N06596100A01) was queried in the CBP Person Lookout system on February 25, 2021.
The query was run from the CBP Headquarters, OFO National Targeting Center.
The query hit notification was forwarded within the FBI's New York Field Office and Eurasian Organized Crime Task Force, indicating ongoing inter-agency interest.
The document identifier for this record is EFTA00151490.
